channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My mother, 81, discovered her ‘millions’ in investments are gone. What can I do?
item.description: “She’s a very proud woman.”

item.title: ‘I have almost no retirement savings’: I’m 57 and have $8K in my 401(k) and $17K in my IRA. Have I left it too late?
item.description: “I plan to work until I’m 70.”

item.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
item.description: “After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year.”

item.title: My friend married for a second time. Will the kids from her first marriage lose their inheritance?
item.description: “Her husband wants to be the administrator of their trust.”

item.title: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?
item.description: “We want to invest the money and play catch up with our retirement savings/funding.”
